summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 6.3°C) and outside temperature (down 6.0°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 16%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 17250 lux) and cloud levels (up 502 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 16309 lux), the amount of wind (up 20 miles), cloud levels (up 313 m), and outside humidity (down 9%) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, low humidity will be noticeable and gentle light winds are expected. Chance of light rain, low clouds are expected, possibly some fog or persistent clouds, and low sunlight due to cloudy or overcast skies. Little change in the weather.
